events.message: I recently ordered a jacket from your website, but I want to request a refund because the size I received is completely wrong and doesn't fit at all.
The customer's issue has been identified as a refund request due to receiving the wrong size product.
The case has been assigned to the refunds department for further handling by the support agent.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to assist you with your request for a refund due to the wrong size jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and still has the tags attached for us to process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. Yes, the jacket is brand new, the tags are still on, and I haven't worn it at all.
Thank you for the info. We will send you a prepaid return shipping label shortly and process your refund as soon as we receive the jacket back.
That sounds great, thanks so much for your help and quick response. I appreciate it!
We have received the returned jacket and your refund has been processed successfully. You should see the amount credited on your payment method soon.
Just checking in to ensure that you have received the refund and that everything is satisfactory with the resolution.
Since your refund was processed and you've confirmed receipt, we will now close this case. Thank you for contacting us.
We have sent you a short survey to get your feedback on your support experience. We appreciate your time.
